mapper.insert: insert into tb_collection (collection_id, collection_userid, article_id, article_title, article_link, article_body, article_image, article_descript, create_time, update_time, collection_descript) values (#{collectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectionUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{collectionDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
